header.description: Partner with JobsAdmire for pre-screened, ready to work employees. We handle recruitment, visas, and all legal documentation.

form.title: Partner Registration
form.subtitle: Register your company to start hiring quality staff. Our team will contact you within 24 hours.

staffing_requirements.title: Staffing Requirements
staffing_requirements.specific_job_positions_placeholder: e.g., Machine Operator, Welders, Software Developer, etc.
staffing_requirements.preferred_nationalities_placeholder: e.g., Any, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Ukraine, etc.
staffing_requirements.additional_requirements_placeholder: Any specific skills, certifications, or other requirements for the positions...

company_description.title: About Your Company
company_description.label: Company Description
company_description.placeholder: Tell us about your company, your business activities, work environment, company culture, and why workers would want to join your team...

legal_agreements.title: Legal Agreements
legal_agreements.agree_terms_suffix: and understand the legal obligations for hiring workers through JobsAdmire. *
legal_agreements.terms_error: You must agree to terms and conditions
legal_agreements.agree_privacy_prefix: I acknowledge that I have read and agree to the
legal_agreements.agree_privacy_suffix: and consent to the processing of company data for recruitment services. *
legal_agreements.privacy_error: You must agree to privacy policy

submit.success_message: Registration submitted successfully! Our team will contact you within 24 hours to discuss your hiring needs.
submit.footer_message: Our team will review your application and contact you within 24 hours to discuss your staffing needs.

industries_served.title: Industries We Serve
industries_served.subtitle: We provide skilled workers across all major industries in Turkey

support.title: Need Assistance?
support.description: Our dedicated team is ready to help you find the right staff for your business. We provide complete support from recruitment to employee placement.
support.business_hours: Business Hours: Monday - Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (Turkey Time)
support.response_time: We respond within 2 hours during business hours
